meanings.definition: To surpass in trading or business transactions.
meanings.sent1: She always manages to outtrade her competitors in the stock market.
meanings.sent2: The company is outtrading others by offering better deals.
meanings.sent3: The small business owner joked that she was outtrading the big corporations with her charm.
meanings.sent4: His negotiation skills were so sharp that he was outtrading everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The new online platform revolutionized the industry by outtrading traditional methods.

meanings.definition: The act of outperforming in trading or business transactions.
meanings.sent1: His consistent outtrading of competitors earned him the title of 'Trading Champion'.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was attributed to its outtrading of market expectations.
meanings.sent3: The team celebrated their outtrading of sales targets with a pizza party.
meanings.sent4: Her outtrading of industry standards set a new benchmark for excellence.
meanings.sent5: The company's outtrading was recognized with a prestigious award.
